summary: Pornographic films, also known as adult or erotic films, are made to excite viewers with sexual content. They show nudity and sexual acts, and are meant for adults only. These films have a long history, but were often hidden due to social rules. With technology like DVDs and the internet, they're easier to find now. Some actors even became famous from these films. Despite this, many places still have rules against showing too much sexuality.
title: Pornographic film
